title: OMNIA Dayclub Afternoon (Half-day)
overview: Enjoy a luxurious afternoon at OMNIA Dayclub (now Savaya Bali) with infinity pool views and world-class DJs.

stops.description: Arrive and relax by the infinity pool, enjoy cocktails, and music.
Upgrade to a cabana or stay poolside for sunset DJ sets.

title: OMNIA Dayclub Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of luxury, music, and dining at OMNIA Dayclub (now Savaya Bali).

stops.description: Arrive, enjoy the infinity pool, and premium dining.
Relax in a cabana with personalized service.
Enjoy the sunset with DJ performances.
